articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Pyongyang Weak-current Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Pyongyang Weak-current Machine Plant
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Weak-current Machine Plant.
					 He looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Seeing the newly displayed color photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he said that the room has been arranged well. Every historical memento and material is precious revolutionary legacy to be handed down to posterity, he added.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Il Sung gave his first field guidance to the plant in October, 1955 and Kim Jong Il in September, 1967 and they paid attention to the plant and gave important instructions to it during their several visits to it, noting the foot prints left by them there precisely mean the history of its development.
					
					 He went round the products show room, the processing and assembling shops and other places to learn in detail about the development of new products and production there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the plant are waging a vigorous drive to develop new products with an ambition to produce ultra-modern weak-current machines.
					
					 He underlined the need for the plant to channel efforts into developing new products and, at the same time, conduct an energetic drive for steadily boosting production and ensuring their precision, safety and practicability.
					
					 He spared time to watch a performance given by the itinerant art squad of the plant at the hall of culture.
					
					 Noting that all numbers of the performance truthfully represented the party's policies and the love for the plant and the revolutionary and militant resolution of its workers to become standard-bearers and shock-brigade in carrying out the line and policies of the party, he stressed the performance helped deepen his trust in it. 
					
					 He encouraged the workers of the plant, saying that there is no goal unattainable when they live and work in the Kunja-ri spirit, the most vivid expression of loyalty to the party and the revolution and noblest patriotism, and they can surely produce cutting-edge weak-current machines before the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea if they work hard just as the workers of Kunja-ri did.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials, scientists, technicians and workers of the plant.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hong Yong Chil and Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- It is the 90th birthday of Sok Yong Hwa, a former unconverted long-term prisoner and an indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to him Wednesday.
					
					 Sok, who was born in a tenant family in Ryangsan City, South Kyongsang Province, embarked upon the road for national reunification, deeply revering President Kim Il Sung who built a new country of the people after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 He was arrested by the enemies while fighting to repulse aggressors in the Fatherland Liberation War but kept his revolutionary faith and obligation as a genuine fighter of the party and the leader.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that he was brought back to the fold of the DPRK and awarded a watch bearing the august name of the President, the title of DPRK Hero, National Reunification Prize and other high state commendations.
					
					 Kim Jong Un puts him forward before the country and the people the way the great leaders did, and is taking warm care of him and his family.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday.
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials and deputies who will attend the Third Session of the 13th SPA.
					
					 The deputies laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Indonesian Embassy Staff Members Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Indonesian Embassy Staff Members Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy staff members visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the President's and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the 50th anniversary of the naming of Kimilsungia.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and patriotic and revolutionary careers of his family members, the visitors went round the historical relics preserved at the old home with much care.
					
					 They planted dawn redwoods and zelkova trees around the old home.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 22nd Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 22nd Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Kim Jong Il was elected chairman of the NDC of the DPRK on April 9, Juche 82 (1993) in reflection of the unanimous desire of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, participants in the Third Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, officials of industrial establishments and labor innovators in Pyongyang.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK was an epochal event which opened up a new stage of development in achieving the prosperity of the country and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 In the 1990s the DPRK faced stern hardships as the Cold War between the West and the East was compressed into the DPRK-U.S. stand-off and the imperialist allied forces of the world and all hues of reactionaries made desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK, the fortress of socialism.
					
					 At a time when the world was concerned about the fate of the DPRK, Kim Jong Il was elected chairman of the NDC of the DPRK. He, shouldering upon himself the heavy burden of the revolution and construction, led socialist Korea to victory.
					
					 He clarified that the socialist politics should become the Songun politics that attach importance and give priority to the military affairs, and formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism for the first time in history.
					
					 He made sure that the socialist constitution embodying the Songun revolutionary idea was adopted, Korean-style state machinery with the NDC as its pivot was established and all the state work was conducted on the principle of giving priority to the military affairs.
					
					 He led the DPRK government to thoroughly embody the Juche character and the national character in the state building and activities and firmly preserve independence in external relations.
					
					 He put forward the military affairs as the most important state affairs, steadily strengthened the country's military capabilities and put the DPRK on the position of the world-level military power.
					
					 He made it possible for the DPRK to lay firm material and technical foundation for making a leap forward to a socialist economic power.
					
					 The reporter noted that the feats Kim Jong Il performed by leading the DPRK constitute the encyclopedia of the state building in the era of independence, stressing the bright future of Korea and the eternal prosperity of the nation are guaranteed when those precious feats are defended and glorified forever. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's idea and cause of state building in the era of Songun are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter noted.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the service personnel and people to uphold the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, steadily strengthen the country's overall national power and accelerate the final victory of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: American Deported for Committing Anti-DPRK Acts
articles.content:
American Deported for Committing Anti-DPRK Acts
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A relevant institution of the DPRK investigated American Suh Sandra who had been engaged in plot-breeding and propaganda against the DPRK during her frequent visits to it under the pretext of "grant-in-aid" for nearly 20 years.
					 According to the investigation, she frequented the DPRK from 1998 under the pretence of "humanitarianism" but she has been engaged in anti-DPRK propaganda abroad with photos and videos about the DPRK she secretly produced and directed, out of inveterate repugnancy toward the DPRK.
					
					 She admitted that her acts are ones that seriously insulted the absolute trust of the people of the DPRK in their leader and indelible crimes that infringed on its sovereignty in violation of its law. She apologized for her crimes and earnestly begged for pardon. 
					
					 The relevant institution decided to deport her, taking into full consideration her old age and by displaying the generosity of the DPRK law.

articles.title: Week of Film Show Opens to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Week of Film Show Opens to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A week of film show to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.  
					 "Finding Himself among the People All His Life" and "The Great Benefactor" and other Korean documentary films showing the great personality and traits and immortal feats of the President will be shown at the cinemas and cultural houses in the city and other parts of the country.
					
					 "Star of Korea", "The Sun of the Nation", "Mt. Paektu" and other feature films will be shown.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants watched documentary film "Finding Himself among the People All His Life" (1).

articles.title: Brisk Preparations for Kimilsungia Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
Brisk Preparations for Kimilsungia Festival in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 17th Kimilsungia Festival are making headway in the DPRK.
					 The festival, to start in mid-April, will bring together more than 80 units, including military organs, commissions, ministries and national institutions, as well as overseas compatriots and missions of other countries.
					
					 The festival organizing committee adopted "Immortal Kimilsungia which has come into full bloom with the blessing of the great sun" as the theme of the forthcoming festival and rounded off a general blueprint for the festival venue and posters.
					
					 A work is going on at the final stage to arrange the festival venue under the blueprint.
					
					 Schoolchildren and many citizens, too, have applied for participation in the festival.
					
					 Meanwhile, all provinces of the country are pushing ahead with the preparations for sponsoring Kimilsungia shows in their regions.

articles.title: Successes Made in Greenhouse Vegetables Cultivation
articles.content:
Successes Made in Greenhouse Vegetables Cultivation 
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A socialist emulation drive for the increased agricultural production is getting brisk in the DPRK to remarkably increase the output of greenhouse vegetables and put the cultivation on more scientific and intensive basis. 
					 Agricultural officials and workers of the DPRK devoted themselves to building greenhouses in not less than 200 hectares amid the high-pitched emulation in the past one year and cultivated more 175 100 tons of various kinds of vegetables than the last year. 
					
					 Pyongyang City is the best in the output of greenhouse vegetables.
					
					 It actively organized emulations between districts and counties while conducting political work in the field and thus put spurs to the construction of the greenhouses. 
					
					 South Hamgyong Province enlarged the area of the greenhouses in the cities, counties and cooperative farms and directed great efforts to putting the vegetable cultivation on scientific and intensive basis such as hydroponics.
					
					 North Phyongan Province finished the construction of greenhouses in the cities, counties and cooperative farms in a short span of time and increased the output over 130 percent. 
					
					 In Jagang Province they shared the successes and experience and effectively summed up and assessed the successes to give a boost to the enthusiasm for increased production.
					
					 Kaesong City took steps to improve the techniques and abilities of the cultivators and filled the pipes laid at the greenhouses with nutritive fluid to grow young vegetables with much effort.
					
					 Greenhouse heating problem is also resolved through renovation of thermostat.
					
					 The hot wind of growing greenhouse vegetables now sweep the cooperative farms across the DPRK.

articles.title: New Polio Vaccine Introduced Here
articles.content:
Inactivated Polio Vaccine Introduced Here
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An event of introducing inactivated polio vaccine took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Kim Hyong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, other DPRK medical officials, Timothy Schaffter, representative of the UNICEF, Stephan Paul Jost, representative of the WHO and staff members of those missions here. 
					
					 At the event speakers said that the introduction of inactivated polio vaccine is of great significance in preventing children's diseases and improving their health.
					
					 They noted that the DPRK was playing a positive role in the work to eliminate polio.
					
					 They informed that the UNICEF, WHO and other international bodies and organizations are strengthening cooperation with all countries to eliminate polio.
					
					 A lecture was given on the achievements made in improving the public health service in the DPRK, special features of the vaccine and vaccination.
					
					 The participants went round several clinics in Pyongyang where the vaccine is being inoculated on 14 week-old babies.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Forces' "Theory of Eliminating Followers of North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Forces' "Theory of Eliminating Followers of North"
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The "theory of eliminating followers of the north" much touted by the south Korean puppet forces is a dangerous theory of confrontation and war aimed to justify their policy for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and spur the moves for a war against it, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article. 
					 The theory is a sheer lie to check the south Korean people's struggle for peace against war and step up the moves for provoking a war against the north under the pretext of the non-existent "threats from the north", the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces are using the "theory of eliminating followers of the north" for justifying their war provocation moves backed by the cock-and-bull story about "nuclear threats from the north" and "provocation".
					
					 As for those organizations called the "forces following the north" by the puppet forces, they are progressive, pro-reunification patriotic organizations taking the lead in the struggle for peace and national reunification against war, including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification.
					
					 The puppet forces' racket of eliminating the "forces following the north" has reached the height with an aim to foil the anti-U.S. and anti-war struggle with the recent knife attack on the U.S. ambassador in Seoul as an occasion.
					
					 Their frantic provocation moves have touched off towering indignation and wrath of all the Koreans. Traitors who pursued confrontation and war in collusion with the outsiders with their backs on the nation all met miserable ends throughout history.
					
					 The reckless racket of the puppet forces will bring them shameful self-destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan for Working Hard to Evade Responsibility for Past Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan for Working Hard to Evade Responsibility for Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Bosworth, former U.S. ambassador to south Korea, said that as the German government made a frank apology for the wrongdoings after the Second World War, the issue of past crimes no longer become a stumbling block in the relations with the European countries. And he urged the present chief executive of Japan to make an honest reparation and apology for the past history.
					 Foreign media, commenting on Germany that created an example of the liquation of the past in the European region, urged Japan to follow the former.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says that this is an advice the international community gives to Japan which is working hard to evade the responsibility for the past crimes.
					
					 Germany and Japan are the war criminal states which massacred innocent people by the most brutal and heinous methods after getting engrossed in aggression against different countries in the first half of the 20th century. Germany has made efforts to relieve victimized countries of pain and redeem its crimes even a bit.
					
					 But Japan has behaved quite contrary.
					
					 Japan's rulers have never made sincere apology for the past crimes but totally denied them.
					
					 It has incurred suspicion and hatred, not trust and respect of many countries. It's because Japan's morality and conscience are very vulgar.
					
					 If Japan does not follow the example of Germany, it will suffer only insult and isolation.

articles.title: South Koreans Protest against Regime's Unreasonable Behavior
articles.content:
South Koreans Protest against Regime's Unreasonable Behavior
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of various circles are waging stronger actions against the regime one year since the disaster of the sunken ferry Sewol.
					 The Council of Bereaved Families for Probing Truth behind the April 16 Ferry Sewol Disaster and Building Safe Society and the All-People Measure Council for the Ferry Sewol Disaster launched a march at the joint incense-burning altar in Ansan, Kyonggi Province on Apr. 4.
					
					 Speakers said a special law was instituted to probe truth behind the disaster and the ad hoc investigation committee submitted an enforcement ordinance but the regime has set forth its "enforcement ordinance".
					
					 They urged the regime to stop insulting the bereaved families but retract the "enforcement ordinance" at once.
					
					 Then, the bereaved families and representatives of the organizations had their hair cut short and launched a march in demand of the regime's retraction of the "enforcement ordinance", salvage of the sunken ferry and probe into truth behind the disaster.
					
					 Arriving at the Kwanghwamun Plaza the next day, the marchers held a meeting with thousands of people of various circles.
					
					 6 bodies including the Bar Association for Democratic Society released a statement in protest against the regime's "enforcement ordinance".

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Condemned for Eulogizing Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Condemned for Eulogizing Dictatorship
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore in an editorial on April 3 condemned the puppet forces for eulogizing dictatorship.
					 The editorial recalled that the Ministry of Education forced the publishing house to rewrite subtitle "May 18 movement for democratization sealed in blood" in the history textbook of high schools, claiming it is very stimulating.
					
					 What matters is that on April 2 the court ruled that the behavior of the ministry was just, the editorial noted.
					
					 It said the court's rule is unacceptable.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Invectives against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Invectives against DPRK under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea, addressing a delegation of the U.S. House of Representatives on April 2, blustered that the "nuclear issue of the north" is the "biggest threat to security" and a "serious factor of instability threatening peace in Northeast Asia and other parts of the world". She went the lengths of crying out for "change" and "isolation", saying that she "believed its solution is unification".
					 She also let loose a spate of invectives that "the north is developing nukes and long-range ballistic missiles to pose sustained threat to security" that day, the 47th anniversary of the founding of the puppet Homeland Defence Reserve Forces. Ri Wan Gu, puppet prime minister, echoing Park, claimed that the north is "threatening security". He tried to give impression that the south side is "making much effort to realize durable peace and unification".
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday terms the outbursts of the south Korean puppet forces shameless sophism of confrontational maniacs to do harm to fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 North-targeted nuclear war drill Foal Eagle and the racket for eliminating the "followers of the north" are being kicked off in south Korea, the commentary notes, adding that it is none other than the U.S. and the puppet forces which are harassing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and pushing the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe.
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The puppet forces are being cursed and censured by the whole nation as they are bedeviling the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 That's why they are raising the "nuclear issue of the north" for no reason and building up public opinion to shift the blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations on to the DPRK. But it only betrays before the world the shameless ugly colors of the confrontational maniacs.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations can never be mended and only war will be brought as long as the puppet forces persist in the sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation of social systems.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Resort to Fascist Racket to Quell Anti-"Government" Sentiments
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Resort to Fascist Racket to Quell Anti-"Government" Sentiments
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Ilsan Police Station cracked down on a resident in Koyang City, Kyonggi Province on April 4, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 Policemen searched a place where he was working and confiscated hundreds of leaflets, claiming that he was suspected of scattering leaflets accusing the present chief executive and the regime.
					
					 He was summoned to the police station as he protested the unreasonable search.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded by S. Korean Paper
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on April 6 carried an editorial titled "Let's pool efforts to have 'enforcement ordinance' on Sewol disaster retracted".
					 The editorial said that the chief executive set forth the "enforcement ordinance", making the probe impossible and reducing the special law on the disaster to a dead paper.
					
					 The bereaved families had their hair cut short and launched actions in mourning dresses once again in demand of the immediate abolition of the "enforcement ordinance", salvage of the ferry body and probe into the truth about the disaster, it noted.
					
					 The editorial called upon the people to gather to probe the truth one year since the disaster.

articles.title: European Regional Committee of Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Meets
articles.content:
European Regional Committee of Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Meets
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Germany on March 28.
					 Ri Ji Suk, permanent representative of the regional committee, in an opening address said the suppression of the progressive movement such as the forcible disbandment of a legitimate political party is getting serious and "witch hunting" under the pretext of eliminating "followers of the north" is going on in south Korea.
					
					 But no one can quell the desire of the nation for democracy and reunification, Ri noted, calling upon overseas Koreans to get united to conduct brisk solidarity movement of the north, the south and abroad this year.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the meeting. 
					
					 We will get united under the banner of By Our Nation Itself and dynamically conduct the movement for carrying out the June 15 joint declaration by joining the compatriots in the north and the south this significant year, the resolution said, and went on:
					
					 We should bring to a halt the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises which escalate tensions on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We will conduct dynamic work to check the anti-DPRK leaflets scattering as it is aimed to hurt national concord and unity.
					
					 We should have the "Security Law" abolished at an early date as it is cracking down on activists and organizations for national reunification.
					
					 The meeting reelected Ri Ji Suk as permanent representative of the regional committee.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Organizations Demand Japanese Authorities Stop Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Organizations Demand Japanese Authorities Stop Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a joint statement on March 31 under the title "Abe regime, stop at once illegal and unreasonable suppression of Chongryon".
					 Overseas Koreans hardly repress the astonishment and towering resentment at the fascist violence by the Japanese authorities who hurled police and armored cars into searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on March 26, the statement said.
					
					 Chongryon is a great pride and symbol of overseas Koreans and an organization representing and speaking for the rights and interests of Koreans in Japan, it said, strongly demanding in the name of justice and conscience of the world the Japanese authorities stop at once the illegal and unreasonable suppression and make a courteous apology.
					
					 It noted that Japan should clearly understand that thoroughgoing apology and reparation for its crime-woven history is the only way for it to get recognized by justice and conscience of the world.
					
					 It demanded the Abe regime stop the illegal and unreasonable suppression of Chongryon and halt at once politically-motivated violence and human rights abuses against Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Organization Criticizes Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Organization Criticizes Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Japan issued a statement on April 1 in denunciation of the authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The police authorities perpetrated such violence as searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee under the absurd pretext of the violation of the "foreign currency exchange law."
					
					 Chongryon has neither part nor lot in the violation of the "law."
					
					 The search operation is politically-motivated suppression targeting Chongryon as it lacks any legal validity.
					
					  It is clear that the government manipulated it behind the scene.
					
					  We strongly protest the suppression of Chongryon and will stage a dynamic struggle against the government's moves to reverse the trend for normalizing Japan-DPRK diplomatic relations.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Censured by Personages of Nigeria, Myanmar
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Censured by Personages of Nigeria, Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Personages of Nigeria and Myanmar released statements on Mar. 30 and 31 in protest against the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, noted:
					
					 It was an unprecedented illegal act of offending even constitution and criminal procedure law of Japan that the Japanese police authorities searched the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee who are leading officials of the overseas citizens' organization representing socialist Korea and deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 Such violence is also an unpardonable human rights abuse and act of discrimination against Koreans and an open challenge to the DPRK.
					
					 The political intention sought by the Japanese authorities in sponsoring such violence is to incite the atmosphere against Chongryon and Koreans and silence the voice of the DPRK and other countries in the world demanding Japan's apology and reparation for its past crime-woven colonial history. 
					
					 It is also aimed to authorize more "sanctions" against the DPRK and deliberately lay a stumbling block in the way of mending the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, noted:
					
					 The Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon assumes graver nature as it is timed to coincide with the vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked off by the U.S.
					
					 Japan, styling itself a "law-governed state", perpetrated such violence without any reasonable legal and scientific ground, not content with having come out as a shock brigade in executing the U.S.-led anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, being pursuant to the U.S. scenario. The violence was, indeed, hooliganism to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should make an apology for it, punish those responsible for it and stop such moves hostile to the DPRK as crackdown on Chongryon.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Bulgaria 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association made public a special bulletin on March 30 with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					 The bulletin carried several articles together with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 An article titled "Day of the Sun" said that every year the Korean people significantly celebrate the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung as the Day of the Sun, the greatest holiday of the nation, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are looking up to him as he devoted his all to the country and its people.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the guiding force of the Korean revolution and strengthened the defence capabilities of the country in every way. 
					
					 He is boundlessly revered by the Korean people and other progressives for the great exploits he performed for prosperity of the country, people's happiness and victorious advance of the global cause of socialism. 
					
					 The Korean people instituted the Juche year number with 1912 when he was born as the first year and grandly celebrate April 15, his birthday, as the Day of the Sun. 
					
					 They saw to it that the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun houses his embalmed body and uphold him as the eternal President of the DPRK. 
					
					 Another article titled "Kim Il Sung Library" introduced the library which was built in Sofia in reflection of the boundless reverence of Bulgarian people for him.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Libya
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Libya
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A Libyan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on April 2.
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association who is director?general of the Sunbula International Friendship Club was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including seminar, photo and book exhibition and friendly meeting praising the feats of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in South Africa
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in South Africa
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed with due ceremony in a city of Gauteng Province, South Africa on March 31.
					 Displayed in the venue of the ceremony was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The ceremony declared the formation of the preparatory committee and announced its action program.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events such as meeting, seminar, film show and photo exhibition in the capital city and local areas on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in foreign countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 A seminar was held in Uganda, photo and book exhibition in Malaysia and film show in Nigeria from March 30 to April 3. 
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos showing exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, their works and other photos and books introducing the true picture of Songun Korea. 
					
					 A Korean film documenting the Songun leadership exploits of the great leaders was shown at the film show. 
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung is the peerlessly great man and invincible and iron-willed commander who created the Juche idea, Songun idea and defeated formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialist enemies in one generation. Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea who founded the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army and the DPRK and a prominent leader who made immortal contribution to the global cause of independence, the chairman added.
					
					 The director of the Malaysia-Korea Tourist Company Ltd. said President Kim Il Sung is a peerlessly great man who liberated Korea and built a socialist power. His cause is being successfully carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un and miracles in the DPRK are possible only by the people united close around the leader, the director added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by DR Congo, Myanmar Political Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by DR Congo, Myanmar Political Figures
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Political figures of DR Congo and Myanmar issued statements on March 31 and on April 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo, said Korea today would have been unthinkable without the President. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President, who embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens, rejected flunkeyism and dogmatism and proved the truth that the Korean people have to carry out the Korean revolution with responsibility.
					
					 The world knows many great men, but none of them is as great as the President who defeated two imperialist powers in one generation. 
					
					 The Korean people are missing the President so much and significantly mark the Day of the Sun every year as he provided them with a genuine country in which they have become masters.
					
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, noted as follows:
					
					 The President was a prominent leader who developed the DPRK into a socialist power and made undying exploits for the global cause of independence.
					
					 His great idea and exploits will always remain in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressive people.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un carrying forward the idea and cause of the President and leader Kim Jong Il is wisely leading the party, army and people of the DPRK in their drive for the building of a thriving nation and implementing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Body on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Socialist Construction in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the South Korean Revolution" was posted by the Korean Friendship Association UK on its website on Mar. 26.
					 The work, published on April 14, Juche 54 (1965), clarifies the character and tasks of the south Korean revolution and the basic line at the present stage and concrete ways for carrying it out.
					
					 It also deals with the principled stand of the Workers' Party of Korea on the national reunification, fair and aboveboard proposals for carrying out it and the tasks to be fulfilled to realize the south Korean revolution and hasten the nationwide victory of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Guinean Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Guinean Media
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were carried by Guinean media on March 31 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Guinean Domestic and International Broadcasting Services aired under the title of "Eternal Sun":
					
					 Kim Il Sung, his august name, implies the sun.
					
					 He lighted the way to be followed by mankind with bright rays just like the sun, took warm care of the people and embraced them with great attraction
					
					 He, who embarked on the road of the revolutionary struggle in his early years and founded the great idea guiding the cause of independence, is being praised by progressive mankind as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 The popular masses will surely emerge victorious in their struggle for building a new independent world free from domination, subordination, interference and suppression under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 He pioneered the cause of independence, led it to victory with his original Songun revolutionary leadership and opened up the new era of the development of international relations based on independence.
					
					 He met more than 70 000 foreigners including leaders of party, state and government of 136 countries all his life.
					
					 He rendered material and moral assistance to many countries in their struggle for national liberation and against imperialism and for building a new society.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of mankind as the sun.
					
					 The Seven National Broadcasting Service aired the same content.

articles.title: Russian Personages Protest U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Russian Personages Protest U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The first secretary of the Partizansk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and other Russian personages sent a letter to the puppet president of south Korea in protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills against the DPRK.
					 The letter said:
					
					 We are keeping tabs with deep concern on the joint war drills annually staged by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet army.
					
					 It is greatly regrettable that the south Korean authorities are abetting people in standing against the compatriots, while toeing the U.S. line.
					
					 We urge the south Korean chief executive not to follow in the footsteps of those of some countries who have been reduced to the puppets of the U.S. but face up to the trend of the times to preserve honor and national self-esteem.
					
					 The U.S. doesn't want the reunification and prosperity of Korea.
					
					 That is because emergence of strong Korea might be another obstacle to the implementation of its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 It is our opinion that only when independent politics are enforced in south Korea can war drills that deteriorate the situation on the peninsula and waste the money collected from south Koreans as taxes be stopped.
					
					 Only unshakable will and resolute rejection can ward off a war.
					
					 The Korean people wish for one Korea only.

articles.title: British Organizations Term S. Korean Forces Colonial Stooges
articles.content:
British Organizations Term S. Korean Forces Colonial Stooges
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article on its website on March 26.
					 After the shocking case in which a south Korean citizen attacked the U.S. ambassador to south Korea with a knife in Seoul on March 5, the south Korean chief executive consoled him and paid a well-wishing visit, the article said, and went on:
					
					 This is an expression of "sincere service" of a colonial servant. This reminds one of a stooge working hard to curry favor with colonial governor-general.
					
					 What draws serious attention is that the case caused the whirlwind of frantic racket of eliminating the "forces following the north" across south Korea.
					
					 In this regard, different circles of south Korea are ridiculing and denouncing the puppet group, hardly repressing towering resentment at its sycophancy, submission and hysteria for eliminating the "forces following the north."
					
					 Accusing the "president", they praised Kim Ki Jong who mounted a knife attack on the U.S. ambassador as a patriot. They are urging the conservative authorities to stop the war "alliance" with the U.S. and withdraw the U.S. troops from south Korea.
					
					 The recent case brought home to the world people the true colors of the puppet group as colonial stooges through its racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" and anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria that have reached the height.
					
					 The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK also posted similar articles on their websites.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Accuse U.S. of Its Projected Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Accuse U.S. of Its Projected Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 27 denouncing the U.S. for its attempt to deploy THAAD in south Korea at any cost.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 It is misleading the public, claiming that the deployment is for preventing "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are trying to justify the deployment and cover up their aggressive aim by leading the DPRK to take strong countermeasures against the war drills they kicked off together with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 What the U.S. seeks through the deployment of THAAD is to round off their preparations for preemptive attack on the DPRK as well as to create favorable conditions for containing their strategic rivals China and Russia, pursuant to their strategy for world domination.
					
					 If the U.S. deploys THAAD in south Korea, a new Cold War structure will be formed in Northeast Asia and greater will be the danger of the Korean peninsula turning into the war theater of big powers again.
					
					 We, together with the world progressives, bitterly condemn the U.S. reckless moves.

articles.title: British Organizations Condemn U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Condemn U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on March 29 in denunciation of the U.S. and its followers for their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					 The U.S. and its followers persistently raised the non-existent "human rights issue" in a desperate bid to tarnish the dignity and image of the DPRK and secure a new pretext for interference and aggression, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 They are not in a position to talk about "human rights issue" of others.
					
					 The U.S. has the worst human rights records in the world.
					
					 Japan, war criminal state, is the worse human rights abuser as evidenced by its recent search of the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, a legitimate organization of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 EU countries are subject to international condemnation for innumerable unemployed, the homeless and racial discrimination and south Korea is also a fascist dictatorial "government" brutally suppressing progressive forces.
					
					 If the UN truly values justice and honor, it should no longer be embroiled in the fraud by such guys but nullify the "human rights resolutions" against the DPRK that had already been adopted.
					
					 The U.S. had better clearly understand that its attempt to do harm to the most advantageous Korean-style socialism which the service personnel and people of the DPRK regard as their life and soul is no more than a daydream.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Aparatos Electronicos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Aparatos Electronicos de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Aparatos Electronicos de Pyongyang.
					Su primera destinacion fue la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Tras ver las cromofotografias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il nuevamente colocadas, dijo que la sala se haya acondicionado bien. Anadio que los objetos y los datos historicos son el valioso patrimonio revolucionario a transmitirse generacion tras generacion.
					
					El Presidente y el Dirigente realizaron su primera vista a esta fabrica en octubre del 1955 y en septiembre de 1967, respectivamente, senalo y prosiguio que esos grandes hombres siempre prestaban mucha atencion a esta fabrica y dieron las instrucciones valiosas al visitarla en varias ocasiones. Puntualizo que las huellas de los generalisimos devienen la historia de desarrollo de la fabrica.
					
					Pasando revista a varios puntos incluyendo la sala de exhibicion de mercancias y los talleres de la elaboracion y montaje, averiguo en detalles el estado de invencion de nuevos productos y su produccion. 
					
					Expreso gran satisfaccion de que la clase obrera de la fabrica despliega con dinamismo el desarrollo de nuevos productos con ambicion de fabricar el aparato electronico de punta.
					
					Instruyo enfocar las fuerzas en la invencion de nuevos productos y al mismo tiempo incrementar la cantidad productiva y desarrollar una dinamica lucha por garantizar la exactitud, la estabilidad y la utilidad del producto.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal presencio en la casa cultural la funcion del grupo de agitacion artistica movil de la fabrica.
					
					Recalco que en cada programa palpitan la politica del partido y el amor a fabrica y se lee el caracter revolucionario y combativo de los obreros de la fabrica decididos a ser abanderados y brigadistas de choque en materializar la linea y la orientacion del partido. Dijo con tono conmovedor que la funcion redobla la confianza en esta fabrica.
					
					No habra la meta inconquistable cuando todos trabajen con el espiritu Kunjari, maxima expresion de fidelidad al partido y a la revolucion y el noble patriotismo, destaco e infundio la fuerza y coraje a los obreros de la fabrica aseverando que si ellos se esfuercen como hicieron los obreros de Kunjari podran fabricar sin falta el aparato electronico de punta antes del septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal tomo foto de recuerdo junto con los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y obreros de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron Hong Yong Chil y Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 22o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El 9 de abril del 82 (1993) de la Era Juche, el fue elegido a ese cargo segun el deseo unanime del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Asistieron al acto Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos el partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los secretarios responsables de los comites del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en las provincias, los participantes en el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios e innovadores laborales de las entidades, fabricas y empresas en esta capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El informante dijo que la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN de la RPDC fue un acontecimiento trascendental que abrio la nueva etapa para la prosperidad de la patria y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la revolucionaria del Songun.
					
					La decada de 1990 fue el periodo de las pruebas severas cuando la Guerra Fria entre el Oriente y el Occidente se ha reducido a la confrontacion entre la RPDC y Estados Unidos y las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas del mundo y todos los reaccionarios trataban de aplastar a toda costa a la RPDC, baluarte del socialismo, recordo el informante y continuo:
					
					Al tomar ese cargo en aquel tiempo en que el mundo se preocupaba por el destino de la RPDC, el Generalisimo condujo la Corea socialista a la unica senda de victorias asumiendo todas las responsabilidades de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					El aclaro por primera vez de la historia que la politica socialista debe ser la del Songun que exige dar importancia a los asuntos militares y la formulo como principal modo politico del socialismo.
					
					Hizo aprobar la Constitucion Socialista en que se materializo la idea revolucionaria del Songun, establecer el sistema de administracion del Estado al estilo coreano con el Comite de Defensa Nacional como eje e impulsar todas las labores del Estado en el principio de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares.
					
					Dirigio al poder de la RPDC a materializar cabalmente el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad en la construccion y actividades del Estado y mantener firmemente la posicion independiente en las relaciones exteriores.
					
					Al presentar los asuntos militares como la primera cuestion estatal y fortalecer constantemente las fuerzas militares del pais, coloco la RPDC en la posicion de potencia militar de talla mundial.
					
					Sento la firme base material y tecnica con que la RPDC pudiera saltar a la potencia economica socialista. 
					
					Las hazanas acumuladas en los dias en que el Dirigente conducia a la cabeza a la RPDC son una enciclopedia de la construccion del Estado en la epoca de independencia y en el camino de defenderlas y hacer brillarlas hay el futuro radiante de Corea y la prosperidad eterna de la nacion.
					
					La idea y la causa del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del Estado de la era del Songun se llevan adelante hoy gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y habitantes deben consolidar continuamente el poder nacional de la RPDC y adelantar la victoria final de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista levantando en alto la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.

articles.title: Sok Yong Hwa acoge su 90o cumpleanos
articles.content:
Sok Yong Hwa acoge su 90o cumpleanos 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- El ex preso de larga condena no abjurado y combatiente patriotico por la reunificacion, Sok Yong Hwa, acogio su 90o cumpleanos. 
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un le envio el dia 8 la mesa de cumpleanos.
					
					Sok, nacido en una familia arrendataria de la ciudad de Ryangsan de la provincia de Kyongsang del Sur, emprendio despues de liberacion del pais el camino de la lucha por la reunificacion de la patria con la infinita veneracion al Presidente Kim Il Sung quien levanto el nuevo pais del pueblo.
					
					En el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, fue detenido por los enemigos, pero mantuvo hasta el fin su conviccion y obligacion moral revolucionarias como soldado fiel al partido y lider. 
					
					Gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el regreso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y fue condecorado con el reloj con el nombre del Presidente, el titulo del Heroe de la Republica, el Premio Reunificacion de la Patria, etc. 
					
					Con la misma confianza y amor de los lideres antecedentes, el Mariscal atiende minuciosamente la vida de Sok y sus familiares.

articles.title: Iniciado ciclo de cine por Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Iniciado ciclo de cine por Dia del Sol
						
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado el ciclo de cine en homenaje al dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Se proyectaran en la ocasion en los cines y casas culturales en la ciudad de Pyongyang y las localidades los documentales coreanos alusivos a los nobles rasgos y las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente, inclusive "Entre el pueblo durante toda su vida", "El Presidente Kim Il Sung entre los funcionarios" y "Gran benefactor".
					
					Se llevaran tambien a la pantalla las peliculas de ficcion, tales como "El lucero de Corea", "Sol de la nacion" y "Monte Paektu".
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes vieron la parte 1 del documental "Entre el pueblo durante toda su vida".
